query.statement:
SELECT '0' AS CHECK , MM017.INVNR AS INVNR , MM017.EKGRP AS EKGRP , MM017.LGORT AS LGORT , MM017.LGOBE AS LGOBE , MM017.EKGRP1 AS EKGRP1 , MM017.EINDT AS EINDT , MM017.RDATE_P AS RDATE_P , MM017.RECE_DATE AS RECE_DATE , MM017.RECE_TIME AS RECE_TIME , MM017.DEL_DATE AS DEL_DATE , MM017.DEL_TIME AS DEL_TIME , MM017.MBLNR AS MBLNR , MM017.BUDAT AS BUDAT , MM017.IN_DT AS IN_DT , MM017.IN_TM AS IN_TM , MM017.STO_MBLNR AS STO_MBLNR , MM017.CA_DT AS CA_DT , MM017.CA_TM AS CA_TM , CASE WHEN MM017.STO_MBLNR > '' AND MM017.PRO_F = '2' THEN '5' ELSE MM017.PRO_F END AS PRO_F , MM017.UDATE AS UDATE , MM017.LIFNR AS LIFNR , MM017.POSID AS POSID , MM017.POST1 AS POST1 , MM017.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM017.WERKS AS WERKS , MM012.J_1KFREPRE AS J_1KFREPRE -- , MM012.LIFNR AS LIFNR , MM012.MCOD3 AS MCOD3 , MM012.NAME1 AS NAME1 , MM012.PSTLZ AS PSTLZ , MM012.STRAS AS STRAS , MM012.TELF1 AS TELF1 , MM012.TELFX AS TELFX , MM028.CTEXT2 AS CTEXT2 , MM028.DTEXT1 AS DTEXT1 , MM028.DTEXT2 AS DTEXT2 , MM028.DTEXT3 AS DTEXT3 , MM028.DTEXT4 AS DTEXT4 , MM028.DTEXT5 AS DTEXT5 , MM017.BIGO AS BIGO , MM017.TOT_NET AS TOT_NET , CASE WHEN MM017.INVTAG > '' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END AS INVTAG , MM017.COMPLET_YN , (SELECT COUNT ( DISTINCT MATNR ) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND INVNR = MM017.INVNR ) AS TOTCNT , MM017.EXPCOUNT FROM (
SELECT MM017B.MANDT AS MANDT , MM017B.INVNR AS INVNR , MAX(MM017B.EKGRP) AS EKGRP , MAX(MM017B.LGORT) AS LGORT , MAX(MM017B.LGOBE) AS LGOBE , (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = '10' AND CODE2 = MAX(MM017B.EKGRP) ) AS EKGRP1 , MAX(MM017B.EINDT) AS EINDT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.RDATE_P)) AS RDATE_P , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.RECE_DATE)) AS RECE_DATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.RECE_TIME)) AS RECE_TIME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.DEL_DATE)) AS DEL_DATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.DEL_TIME)) AS DEL_TIME , MAX(MM017B.MBLNR) AS MBLNR , MAX(MM017B.POSID) AS POSID , MAX(MM017B.POST1) AS POST1 , MAX(MM017B.EXTWG) AS EXTWG , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.BUDAT)) AS BUDAT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.IN_DT)) AS IN_DT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.IN_TM)) AS IN_TM , MAX(MM017B.STO_MBLNR) AS STO_MBLNR , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.CA_DT)) AS CA_DT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.CA_TM)) AS CA_TM , MAX(MM017B.PRO_F) AS PRO_F , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM017B.UDATE)) AS UDATE , MAX(MM017B.LIFNR) AS LIFNR , MIN(MM017B.WERKS) AS WERKS , CASE WHEN MIN(SAPHEE.GET_JAJEA_BALJU(MM017B.MANDT, MM017B.POSID,MM017B.MATNR)) < 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS BIGO -- ,'0' AS BIGO , SUM(MM017B.MENGE * SAPHEE.GET_CURRDATA(MM017B.WAERS,MM017B.NETPR)) AS TOT_NET , VALUE(MAX(MM017B.INVTAG),'') AS INVTAG , MAX(MM017Z.COMPLET_YN) AS COMPLET_YN , COUNT(DISTINCT MM186.MATNR) AS EXPCOUNT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 AS MM017B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT017_Z AS MM017Z ON MM017B.MANDT = MM017Z.MANDT AND MM017B.INVNR = MM017Z.INVNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT186 AS MM186 ON MM017B.MANDT = MM186.MANDT AND MM017B.MATNR = MM186.MATNR WHERE MM017B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM017B.INVNR IN ( SELECT INVNR FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND INVNR = #INVNR#
AND LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND DDATE = '00000000' AND RDATE_P BETWEEN #RDATE_P_FM# AND #RDATE_P_TO# AND POTYPE = 'X'
AND WERKS = #WERKS#
AND EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
AND RECE_DATE BETWEEN #RECE_DATE_FM# AND #RECE_DATE_TO#
AND POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
)
AND MM017B.PRO_F = #PRO_F#
AND MM017B.PRO_F > '0'
AND MM017B.DDATE = '00000000' GROUP BY MM017B.MANDT,MM017B.INVNR ) AS MM017 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS MM012 ON MM017.MANDT = MM012.MANDT AND MM017.LIFNR = MM012.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS MM028 ON MM017.MANDT = MM028.MANDT AND MM028.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028.CODE1 = '4' AND CODE2= '1000' --MM017.WERKS WHERE MM017.MANDT=#G_MANDT# ORDER BY MM017.INVNR FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
